briefTitle: Long-term Safety of SPD422 in Japanese Adults With Essential Thrombocythaemia
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Multi-centre, Open-label, Extension Study to Investigate the Long-term Safety of SPD422 in Japanese Adults With Essential Thrombocythaemia
summary: The purpose of this study is to provide SPD422 to subjects who completed Study SPD422 308 and, in the opinion of the Investigator, will continue to benefit from treatment.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Platelet Count at Final Assessment
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline and final assessment (within 5 days of the last dose of investigational product)
